context.p: If you are the group admin, you can deactivate a group chat by removing all participants. This way, no one can send new messages to the group.

steps.stepsection: To remove all participants and delete a group, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Open the group chat and tap the group subject.

For each participant, tap their name, and then select
Remove from Group Remove
.
To remove yourself from the group, tap Exit Group.

step.note: After you delete the chat history from your phone, other group members can continue viewing the chat history.
step.cmd: If you want to delete the chat history from your phone, tap Delete Group.
